question: How many white color Adidas t shirts do we have left in the stock?
sql: SELECT stock_qty FROM inventory WHERE brand='Adidas' AND color='White';

question: How much sales will we generate if we sell all extra-small size t shirts after applying discounts?
sql: SELECT SUM(i.stock_qty * i.price * (1 - d.discount_pct/100)) AS revenue FROM inventory i JOIN discounts d ON i.brand=d.brand WHERE i.size='XS';

question: List total stock by brand.
sql: SELECT brand, SUM(stock_qty) AS total_stock FROM inventory GROUP BY brand;
